name: TVSeries
0:
”Alexa ask television series when will the next episode of The Walking Dead air”
”Alexa ask television series what is the plot of Stranger Things”
”Alexa ask television series how long is an episode of The Office”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: television series
des:
►►► MANY NEW AND IMPROVED FUNCTIONALITIES ◄◄◄
►► Updated September 2022 ◄◄

Tv Series will tell you all you need to know about your favorite Tv shows,
With only a question you'll know if you will have to tell your friends that you won't be able to go out on Friday night.

Features:

♦ Next Episode air date

Examples:
• Alexa ask television series when will the next episode of The Walking Dead come out 
• Alexa ask television series when Stranger Things will air


♦ Plot of the TV show

Examples:
• Alexa ask television series what's the plot for Stranger Things
• Alexa ask television series what is The Office about


♦ How many seasons a show has

Examples:
• Alexa ask television series how many seasons does Orange Is The New Black have
• Alexa ask television series the number of seasons of Modern Family


♦ How long is an episode

Examples:
• Alexa ask television series what's the runtime for Money Heist
• Alexa ask television series how long is an episode of The Big Bang Theory


♦ First episode released

Examples:
• Alexa ask television series when was Sherlock released
• Alexa ask television series when did Pretty Little Liars first air


♦ Is the show still running

Examples:
• Alexa ask television series is How I Met Your Mother still running
• Alexa ask television series if American Horror Story is finished 


♦ Who is in the cast

Examples:
• Alexa ask television series cast of Grey's Anatomy 
• Alexa ask television series who are the actors in Riverdale


♦ Show creator

Examples:
• Alexa ask television series who wrote Westworld
• Alexa ask television series who created Black Mirror


♦ Latest Episode: get the release date of the latest episode that was aired

Examples:
• Alexa ask television series when did the last episode of Breaking bad air
• Alexa ask television series when was Game of Thrones aired
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
